name: Card Counter
description: Shows the number of cards in the lists.
author: Restya
large_description: Add the card counter to show how many cards you have in your lists and board. It gives easier collaboration and project management.
- It will show the number at the top of the list which shows you the total number of the cards
- And also activating any filter will temporarily show you a total count of all cards in each list at the top, Based on the filters.
